allowAnyUser: Allow login of all authenticatable users
allowAnyUserTooltip: A user account in Seatsurfing's internal user directory will be created on first successful login.
allowBookingNonExistUsers: Allow bookings for non-existing users (create on booking, admins only)
askApplyRecurrenceAnyway: Apply recurrence to book available time slots anyway?
bookingPending: Your booking needs to be confirmed first.
cloudFeatureHeadline: This feature is only available in the Professional Edition.
cloudFeedbackError: An error occurred while sending your feedback. Please try again later.
cloudFeedbackPrompt: What do you like, what would you want us to improve about Seatsurfing?
cloudFeedbackThanks: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us
cloudUpgradeHintHeadline: Unlock additional features and unlimited users
cloudUpgradeHintText: Upgrade to Seatsurfing Professional with just one click
confirmDeleteArea: Delete area? All spaces and bookings will be lost!
confirmDeleteAuthProvider: Delete Auth Provider? Logins using this provider will not be possible anymore!
confirmDeleteOrg2: Are you REALLY sure? If you delete this organization, all bookings, areas, spaces and users will be deleted irretrievably. No recovery will be possible.
confluenceAnonymous: Allow anonymous Confluence users (for demonstration purposes only)
confluenceAnonymousHint: Kürjük jelentkezz be a Confluence fiókoddal, hogy használni tudd a Seatsurfing for Confluence App-ot.
confluenceClientIdHint: Üdvözöl a Seatsurfing! Az alkalmazás működéséhez össze kell kapcsolni a Confluence példányt a Seatsurfing fiókoddal. Kérjük kövesd az alábbi lépéseket:
confluenceClientIdStep1: Hozz létre egy ingyenes Seatsurfing fiókot.
confluenceClientIdStep5: Illeszd be az azonosítót a 'Confluence Client ID' mezőbe és mentsd a beállításokat.
customLogoUrlHint: Leave empty to use the default logo
dailyBasisBooking: Allow bookings on a daily basis only
errorSlotConflict: There is already another booking in the selected date range.
errorCaldav: Error connecting to CalDAV Server. Check URL and credentials.
errorDeleteBooking: An error occurred while deleting your booking.
errorDeleteBookingBeforeMaxCancel: You cannot cancel a booking less than {{num}} hours before. Contact an admin.
errorDateRangeTooLong: The selected date range is too large.
errorEnterFuture: Az érkezés időpontja nem lehet a múltban.
errorLeaveAfterEnter: A távozás időpontja az érkezés után kell legyen.
errorLeavePast: Leave date must be not be in the past
errorLogin: Hiba lépett fel a bejelentkezés során. Lehet, hogy az email címed nem tartozik egyik szervezethez sem.
errorMaxBookingDuration: A megengedett maximális foglalás időtartama {{num}} óra.
errorMinBookingDuration: The minimum booking duration is {{num}} hours.
errorNoAuthProviders: Nem található autentikációs szolgáltató ehhez a felhasználóhoz.
errorSave: Sikertelen mentés, kérjük próbáld meg később.
errorSubscriptionLimit: You've reached the maximum number of users.
errorTooManyConcurrent: A választott térben nincs szabad hely.
errorTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errorUnknown: Ismeretlen hiba, kérjük próbáld meg újra.
errorValidateDomain: Error verifying domain {{domain}}: Please ensure that you've set up the DNS TXT record correctly.
errorInPast: Your booking cannot be in the past.
initPasswordResetEmail: A jelszó visszaállításhoz ellenőrizd az email-ed.
initPasswordResetFailed: Ez nem sikerült! Kérjük próbáld meg később.
introIncomingMergeRequests: Fiók egyesítési kérelmed érkezett. Csak akkor fogadd el ha te kezdeményezted.
loginFailedDescription: Lehet, hogy a fiókod nincs aktiválva ebben a szervezetben.
loginUseUsernamePassword: Sign in with username and password
maxHoursBeforeDelete: Max. hours to cancel a booking before its start time
mergeUserAccountsHint: Könnyedén egyesítheted ezt a Confluence Seatsurfing fiókot a hagyományos Seatsurfing fiókoddal. Ezt követően a mobil appon és a Confluence integráción keresztül is tudod majd kezelni a foglalásaid. Add meg a hagyományos Seatsurfing fiókod email címét a kezdéshez.
mergeUserAccountsNextStepHint: Remek! Egy lépés maradt: Jelentkezz be a hagyományos Seatsurfing fiókodba és erősítsd meg a fiók egyesítési kérelmet egy órán belül.
name: Name
noAdminRestrictions: Don't restrict admins (bookings per user, duration, in advance)
noAreasFounds: No areas found. Please try to adjust your filters.
orgSignupFailed: That didn't work as expected! Maybe your registration has timed out.
orgSignupSuccess: You're ready to go! Your Seatsurfing organization has been set up.
recurrenceAvailabilityError: {{numErr}} of {{numTotal}} occurrences are not available for the selected recurrence.
saveAreaToGetLink: Save area to get a valid link
setAllowBookersHint: Leave empty if booking is not limited.
setApproversHint: Leave empty if no approval is required.
subject: Subject
updateAvailable: Please update Seatsurfing to the latest version {{version}}.
verifyDomainHowto: To verify domain {{domain}}, please add the following TXT record to your DNS server:
verifyEmailHint: Please enter the verification code that has been sent to your new email address in order to persist the changed email address.
spaceBookedInfo: This space is already booked and not available in the selected date range.
spaceBookedInfoMyBooking: You already booked this space in the selected date range.
